title: The Twelve Days Of Christmas
lyrics:
On the (C)first day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
A (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)  (C)
 
On the (C)second day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)  (C)
 
On the (C)third  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)fourth  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)fifth  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)sixth  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(G)Six geese a-laying
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)seventh  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(G)Seven swans a-swimming
(G)Six geese a-laying
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)eighth  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(G)Eight maids a-milking
(G)Seven swans a-swimming
(G)Six geese a-laying
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)ninth  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(G)Nine drummers drumming
(G)Eight maids a-milking
(G)Seven swans a-swimming
(G)Six geese a-laying
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)tenth  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(G)Ten pipers piping
(G)Nine drummers drumming
(G)Eight maids a-milking
(G)Seven swans a-swimming
(G)Six geese a-laying
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G) 
 
On the e(C)leventh  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
E(G)leven ladies dancing
(G)Ten pipers piping
(G)Nine drummers drumming
(G)Eight maids a-milking
(G)Seven swans a-swimming
(G)Six geese a-laying
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)
 
On the (C)twelfth  day of Christ(C)mas my (G)true love sent to C)me
(G)Twelve lords a-leaping
E(G)leven ladies dancing
(G)Ten pipers piping
(G)Nine drummers drumming
(G)Eight maids a-milking
(G)Seven swans a-swimming
(G)Six geese a-laying
(Em)Five (D)gold (G-tremolo)rings... (G7)
(C)Four colley birds
(F)Three French hens
(G)Two turtle-doves
(G)And a (C)partridge (G)in a pear (C)tree (G)  [end]
